examples: All the tiling in the bathroom must be removed because of water damage to the wood under it.
We spent all day doing the tiling in the bathroom.

definitions.definition: A tessellation ; the covering of a plane with shapes , without overlaps or gaps.
A technique for optimizing loops by partitioning the iteration space into smaller chunks or blocks that will more easily fit in a cache .

secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The act of applying tiles .
( geometry ) A tessellation ; the covering of a plane with shapes , without overlaps or gaps.
( computing theory ) A technique for optimizing loops by partitioning the iteration space into smaller chunks or blocks that will more easily fit in a cache .
